text.textblock: In accordance with Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, as amended), the National Science Foundation announces the following meeting.
January 21, from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m.; January 22, from 8:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m.
Holiday Inn Arlington, 4610 North Fairfax Drive, Arlington, VA 22230.
Dr. Margaret B Cozzens, Division Director Division of Materials Development, Research and Informal Science Education, room 885, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, Arlington, VA 22230, telephone: (703) 307-1620.
To provide advice and recommendations concerning proposals submitted to NSF for financial support.
To review and evaluate proposals as part of the selection process of awards.

The proposals being reviewed include information of a proprietary or confidential nature, including technical information; financial data, such as salaries; and personal information concerning individuals associated with the proposals. These matters are exempt under 5 U.S.C. 552b(c) (4) and (6) of the Government in the Sunshine Act.

doctitle.textblock: Special Emphasis Panel in Elementary, Secondary and Informal Education; Notice of Meeting
